channel.title: CVE Feed for vivo -- appstore
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vivo -- appstore

item.title: CVE-2020-12483|2024-09-16T22:56:44.301Z -- vivo -- appstore
item.description: The appstore before 8.12.0.0 exposes some of its components, and the attacker can cause remote download and install apps through carefully constructed parameters.
